data.title: Founding Supporters
data.meta_description: The Founding Supporters have helped build the Academy Museum, led by Academy Museum Board Chair Ron Meyer as well as Campaign Co-Chairs Bob Iger, Tom Hanks, and Annette Bening. Thank you for your support.
